message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of our premium product with you. I believe it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. As a valued customer, I'm willing to offer it to you for $1200000. This is a great deal, considering its market value is $1500000. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but $1200000 is a bit steep for me. I was thinking more along the lines of $900000. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $1050000?

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I understand that $1050000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1175000. This is a fair price considering its market value and the value it will bring to your business. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but $1175000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to pay $1000000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that $1000000 is a bit below my target, but I'm willing to consider it. I'm willing to make a small concession and sell the product to you for $1075000. This is a fair price considering its market value and the value it will bring to your business. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make a concession, but $1075000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to pay $950000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I understand that $950000 is still a bit below my target, but I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1050000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, considering its market value and the value it will bring to your business. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but $1050000 is still a bit above my target. I'm willing to pay $925000 for the product. Can you consider this offer?

I'm starting to get concerned that we're getting too far apart, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need you to meet me halfway. I'm willing to sell the product to you for $1025000. This is the final price I'm willing to accept. If you're not willing to meet me at this price, I'll have to consider other options.

I understand that you're willing to make one more concession, but I'm still not comfortable with $1025000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $975000. This is my final offer. If you're not willing to accept it, I'll have to explore other options, including buying the product from John for $1500000.
